DOC.brief_summary: How effective sugar reduce debriding sloughy , necrotic infect exudate wound compare standard treatment ?
DOC.detailed_description: Patients follow apply : Have exudate wound size 5cm2 40cm2 A minimum 25 % slough , infect necrotic tissue No dry necrotic eschar present Ankle Brachial Pressure Index great 0.6 Are 18 year Independently willingly consent
DOC.criteria: Exudating wound size 5cm2 40cm2 A minimum 25 % slough , infect necrotic tissue No dry necrotic eschar Ankle Brachial Pressure Index great 0.6 Age 18 year Able independently willingly consent Participants trial evaluate therapy wound Have previously trial Women pregnant Participants able tolerate daily dress change
